verses.verse: And<WG2532> they came over<WG2064> unto<WG1519> the other side<WG4008> of the sea<WG2281>, into<WG1519> the country<WG5561> of the Gadarenes<WG1046>.

And<WG2532> when he<WG846> was come<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the ship<WG4143>, immediately<WG2112> there met<WG528> him<WG846> out of<WG1537> the tombs<WG3419> a man<WG444> with<WG1722> an unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151>,
Who<WG3739> had<WG2192> his dwelling<WG2731> among<WG1722> the tombs<WG3419>; and<WG2532> no man<WG3762> could<WG1410> bind<WG1210> him<WG846>, no, not<WG3777> with chains<WG254>:

Because<WG1223> that he<WG846> had been often<WG4178> bound<WG1210> with fetters<WG3976> and<WG2532> chains<WG254>, and<WG2532> the chains<WG254> had been plucked asunder<WG1288> by<WG5259> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> the fetters<WG3976> broken in pieces<WG4937>: neither<WG2532> could<WG2480> any man tame<WG1150> him<WG846><WG3762>.

And<WG2532> always<WG1275>, night<WG3571> and<WG2532> day<WG2250>, he was<WG2258> in<WG1722> the mountains<WG3735>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the tombs<WG3418>, crying<WG2896>, and<WG2532> cutting<WG2629> himself<WG1438> with stones<WG3037>.
But<WG1161> when he saw<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424> afar off<WG575><WG3113>, he ran<WG5143> and<WG2532> worshipped<WG4352> him<WG846>,

And<WG2532> cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456>, and said<WG2036>, What<WG5101> have I<WG1698> to do<WG2532> with thee<WG4671>, Jesus<WG2424>, thou Son<WG5207> of the most high<WG5310> God<WG2316>? I adjure<WG3726> thee<WG4571> by God<WG2316>, that thou torment<WG928> me<WG3165> not<WG3361>.
For<WG1063> he said<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Come <WG1831> out of <WG1537> the man <WG444> , thou unclean <WG169> spirit <WG4151> .

And<WG2532> he asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, What <WG5101> is thy <WG4671> name <WG3686> ? And<WG2532> he answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004>, My<WG3427> name<WG3686> is Legion<WG3003>: for<WG3754> we are<WG2070> many<WG4183>.
And<WG2532> he besought<WG3870> him<WG846> much<WG4183> that<WG3363> he would<WG649> not<WG3363> send<WG649> them<WG846> away<WG649> out of<WG1854> the country<WG5561>.
Now<WG1161> there was<WG2258> there<WG1563> nigh<WG4314> unto the mountains<WG3735> a great<WG3173> herd<WG34> of swine<WG5519> feeding<WG1006>.

And<WG2532> all<WG3956> the devils<WG1142> besought<WG3870> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Send<WG3992> us<WG2248> into<WG1519> the swine<WG5519>, that<WG2443> we may enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> them<WG846>.

And<WG2532> forthwith<WG2112> Jesus<WG2424> gave<WG2010> them<WG846> leave<WG2010>. And<WG2532> the unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151> went out<WG1831>, and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the swine<WG5519>: and<WG2532> the herd<WG34> ran<WG3729> violently down<WG2596> a steep place<WG2911> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281><WG1161>, (they were<WG2258> about<WG5613> two thousand<WG1367>;) and<WG2532> were choked<WG4155> in<WG1722> the sea<WG2281>.

And<WG1161> they that fed<WG1006> the swine<WG5519> fled<WG5343>, and<WG2532> told<WG312> it in<WG1519> the city<WG4172>, and<WG2532> in<WG1519> the country<WG68>. And<WG2532> they went out<WG1831> to see<WG1492> what<WG5101> it was<WG2076> that was done<WG1096>.

And<WG2532> they come<WG2064> to<WG4314> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> see<WG2334> him that was possessed with the devil<WG1139>, and had<WG2192> the legion<WG3003>, sitting<WG2521>, and<WG2532> clothed<WG2439>, and<WG2532> in his right mind<WG4993>: and<WG2532> they were afraid<WG5399>.
And<WG2532> they that saw<WG1492> it told<WG1334> them<WG846> how<WG4459> it befell<WG1096> to him that was possessed with the devil<WG1139>, and<WG2532> also concerning<WG4012> the swine<WG5519>.
And<WG2532> they began<WG756> to pray<WG3870> him<WG846> to depart<WG565> out of<WG575> their<WG846> coasts<WG3725>.

And<WG2532> when he<WG846> was come<WG1684> into<WG1519> the ship<WG4143>, he that had been possessed with the devil<WG1139> prayed<WG3870> him<WG846> that<WG2443> he might be<WG5600> with<WG3326> him<WG846>.

Howbeit<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> suffered<WG863> him<WG846> not<WG3756>, but<WG235> saith<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Go <WG5217> home <WG1519><WG3624><WG4675> to <WG4314> thy friends <WG4674> , and <WG2532> tell <WG312> them <WG846> how great things <WG3745> the Lord <WG2962> hath done <WG4160> for thee <WG4671> , and <WG2532> hath had compassion <WG1653> on thee <WG4571> .

And<WG2532> he departed<WG565>, and<WG2532> began<WG756> to publish<WG2784> in<WG1722> Decapolis<WG1179> how great things<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> had done<WG4160> for him<WG846>: and<WG2532> all<WG3956> men did marvel<WG2296>.

And<WG2532> when Jesus<WG2424> was passed over<WG1276> again<WG3825> by<WG1722> ship<WG4143> unto<WG1519> the other side<WG4008>, much<WG4183> people<WG3793> gathered<WG4863> unto<WG1909> him<WG846>: and<WG2532> he was<WG2258> nigh<WG3844> unto the sea<WG2281>.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, there cometh<WG2064> one<WG1520> of the rulers of the synagogue<WG752>, Jairus<WG2383> by name<WG3686>; and<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, he fell<WG4098> at<WG4314> his<WG846> feet<WG4228>,

And<WG2532> besought<WG3870> him<WG846> greatly<WG4183>, saying<WG3004><WG3754>, My<WG3450> little daughter<WG2365> lieth<WG2079> at the point of death<WG2192>: I pray thee, come<WG2064> and<WG2443> lay<WG2007> thy hands<WG5495> on her<WG846>, that<WG3704> she may be healed<WG4982>; and<WG2532> she shall live<WG2198>.
And<WG2532> Jesus went<WG565> with<WG3326> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> much<WG4183> people<WG3793> followed<WG190> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> thronged<WG4918> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> a certain<WG5100> woman<WG1135>, which had an<WG1722> issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129><WG5607> twelve<WG1427> years<WG2094>,

And<WG2532> had suffered<WG3958> many things<WG4183> of<WG5259> many<WG4183> physicians<WG2395>, and<WG2532> had spent<WG1159> all<WG3956> that she<WG1438> had<WG3844>, and<WG2532> was<WG5623> nothing<WG3367> bettered<WG5623>, but<WG235> rather<WG3123> grew<WG2064> worse<WG1519><WG5501>,
When she had heard<WG191> of<WG4012> Jesus<WG2424>, came<WG2064> in<WG1722> the press<WG3793> behind<WG3693>, and touched<WG680> his<WG846> garment<WG2440>.
For<WG1063> she said<WG3004>, If<WG3754><WG2579> I may touch<WG680> but<WG2579> his<WG846> clothes<WG2440>, I shall be whole<WG4982>.

And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> the fountain<WG4077> of her<WG846> blood<WG129> was dried up<WG3583>; and<WG2532> she felt<WG1097> in her body<WG4983> that<WG3754> she was healed<WG2390> of<WG575> that plague<WG3148>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424>, immediately<WG2112> knowing<WG1921> in<WG1722> himself<WG1438> that virtue<WG1411> had gone<WG1831> out of<WG1537> him<WG846>, turned him about<WG1994> in<WG1722> the press<WG3793>, and said<WG3004>, Who <WG5101> touched <WG680> my <WG3450> clothes <WG2440> ?

And<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> said<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Thou seest<WG991> the multitude<WG3793> thronging<WG4918> thee<WG4571>, and<WG2532> sayest thou<WG3004>, Who<WG5101> touched<WG680> me<WG3450>?
And<WG2532> he looked round about<WG4017> to see<WG1492> her that had done<WG4160> this thing<WG5124>.

But<WG1161> the woman<WG1135> fearing<WG5399> and<WG2532> trembling<WG5141>, knowing<WG1492> what<WG3739> was done<WG1096> in<WG1909> her<WG846>, came<WG2064> and<WG2532> fell down before<WG4363> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> told<WG2036> him<WG846> all<WG3956> the truth<WG225>.

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> unto her<WG846>, Daughter <WG2364> , thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> hath made <WG4982> thee <WG4571> whole <WG4982> ; go <WG5217> in <WG1519> peace <WG1515> , and <WG2532> be <WG2468> whole <WG5199> of <WG575> thy <WG4675> plague <WG3148> .

While<WG2089> he<WG846> yet<WG2089> spake<WG2980>, there came<WG2064> from<WG575> the ruler of the synagogue's<WG752> house certain which said<WG3004><WG3754>, Thy<WG4675> daughter<WG2364> is dead<WG599>: why<WG5101> troublest thou<WG4660> the Master<WG1320> any further<WG2089>?

As soon as<WG1161><WG2112> Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> the word<WG3056> that was spoken<WG2980>, he saith<WG3004> unto the ruler of the synagogue<WG752>, Be <WG5399> not <WG3361> afraid <WG5399> , only <WG3440> believe <WG4100> .
And<WG2532> he suffered<WG863><WG3756> no man<WG3762> to follow<WG4870> him<WG846>, save<WG1508> Peter<WG4074>, and<WG2532> James<WG2385>, and<WG2532> John<WG2491> the brother<WG80> of James<WG2385>.

And<WG2532> he cometh<WG2064> to<WG1519> the house<WG3624> of the ruler of the synagogue<WG752>, and<WG2532> seeth<WG2334> the tumult<WG2351>, and them that wept<WG2799> and<WG2532> wailed<WG214> greatly<WG4183>.

And<WG2532> when he was come in<WG1525>, he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Why <WG5101> make ye this ado <WG2350> , and <WG2532> weep <WG2799> ? the damsel <WG3813> is <WG599> not <WG3756> dead <WG599> , but <WG235> sleepeth <WG2518> .

And<WG2532> they laughed<WG2606> him<WG846> to scorn<WG2606>. But<WG1161> when he had put<WG1544> them all<WG537> out<WG1544>, he taketh<WG3880> the father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the mother<WG3384> of the damsel<WG3813>, and<WG2532> them that were with<WG3326> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> entereth in<WG1531> where<WG3699> the damsel<WG3813> was<WG2258> lying<WG345>.

And<WG2532> he took<WG2902> the damsel<WG3813> by the hand<WG5495>, and said<WG3004> unto her<WG846>, Talitha <WG5008> cumi <WG2891> ; which<WG3739> is<WG2076>, being interpreted<WG3177>, Damsel<WG2877>, I say<WG3004> unto thee<WG4671>, arise<WG1453>.

And<WG2532> straightway<WG2112> the damsel<WG2877> arose<WG450>, and<WG2532> walked<WG4043>; for<WG1063> she was<WG2258> of the age of twelve<WG1427> years<WG2094>. And<WG2532> they were astonished<WG1839> with a great<WG3173> astonishment<WG1611>.

And<WG2532> he charged<WG1291> them<WG846> straitly<WG4183> that<WG2443> no man<WG3367> should know<WG1097> it<WG5124>; and<WG2532> commanded<WG2036> that something should be given<WG1325> her<WG846> to eat<WG5315>.
